_json.gridTitle: Short Hairstyle Ideas And Trends | Southern Living
_json.description: Boyish Pixie | Hit the refresh button on your curls. A Southern lady knows how to accessorize, from her heirloom jewelry to her bold red lip. But if she’s a curly girl, she knows her greatest accessory is God-given and sticks by her, rain or shine. Her precious curls! Whether tousled waves, bouncy spirals, or springy coils, curly hair is like your most uninhibited friend—vivacious, plucky, and often unpredictable. She can be the center of attention in any room, in a good way—or, on humid days,
